import React from 'react'; import data from "../../data"; import Rating from "../Rating"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id) if(!product) { return
Product was not found
//create a custom 404 page to render error. } return (
Back

{product.name}

${product.price}

{product.description}
{ product.countInStock > 0 ? In Stock : Sold Out }
) } export default ProductScreen
